frame.name: Biological_entity
frame.definition:
<def-root>The LUs in this frame refer to biological entities labeled by the FE <fen>Organism</fen>. An <fen>Organism</fen> is described as something that can be alive, or have naturally occuring biological processes and functions; however the concept of life is often used metaphorically for non-organic entities which resemble or act as if they have organic life.
<ex>NASA may someday discover a <fex name="Descriptor">new</fex> <fex name="Organism"><t>lifeform</t></fex> <fex name="Origin">from another planet</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Organism
FE.definition: <def-root>An organic that has naturally occuring bioligical processes and functions.</def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root>Any characterization of the <fen>Organism</fen> not covered by other FEs. </def-root>
